effect.en: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.
effect.fr: Le Pokémon Actif de votre adversaire est maintenant Endormi.
effect.es: El Pokémon Activo de tu rival pasa a estar Dormido.
effect.it: Il Pokémon attivo del tuo avversario viene addormentato.
effect.pt: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.
effect.de: Das Aktive Pokémon deines Gegners schläft jetzt.

description.en: Flabébé wears a crown made from pollen it's collected from its flower. The crown has hidden healing properties.
